alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:20PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Box Elder...southwestern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 720 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delle, or 19 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delle and Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 52 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys
